description:
Dylan McLovin was home alone on a recent day when he heard a knock on the front door. When he opened it, he was surprised to find a door-to-door salesman. That guy just happened to be the bisexual Jimmy Tripp. When Dylan let Jimmy know he wasn't interested in anything that he might be selling, Jimmy simply asked if he could use the restroom, then be on his way. Dylan agreed and waited outside the bathroom, making sure Jimmy left the door open so he could see if he was stealing anything. Well, let's just say Jimmy was caught with something in his hand, but it wasn't anything of Dylan's. It was his humungous cock!

Since both of these guys were horny, it was only a matter of time before they were sucking each other. From BJs to hand jobs, these two play around and cum before Dylan's mom shows up, making for quite an interesting escape by Jimmy.

Maybe next time you'll think twice before slamming the door in the face of salesman.

Enjoy!
title: Dylan McLovin & Jimmy Trip
